X-Yahoo-Profile: titobeau

After about an hour Celeron finished rewiring the power supply using
parts from the fried one and scraps of wiring that for some reason
were lieing around.  He then threw the broken pieces into an area that
he would designate as his junk pile.  After a quick examination, he
realized that the computer could be turned on (though it would not be
able to be used yet as he hadn't build any networking parts or
replaced the other 2 interface cards).  But he was pleasently suprised
to find that all the software was still intact).  He turned if off,
then when out into the ship again looking for more parts.

OOC: Is this computer the ship's main computer?
